courseSectionInformation: 6 undergraduate hours. 6 graduate hours. Prerequisite: ARCH 374 or ARCH 472.
description: Schematic design and development of a small-scale public building emphasizing the integration of the basic elements of building; materials, details, structure, technology, program, life safety, and universal design. 6 undergraduate hours. 6 graduate hours. Prerequisite: ARCH 374 or ARCH 472.
label: Arch Design & Development
